entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 15
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTH 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 20
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 7 ABOVE
NORTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 6 BELOW

SNOW
MODERATE SNOW ACCUMULATION
COLD WITH HIGHS AROUND 15
NORTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 90 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 4 BELOW

SNOW
NEW HEAVY SNOW ACCUMULATION
COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 13
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 90 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 1 BELOW AFTER MIDNIGHT

CLOUDY
SNOW, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
NEW LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION
HIGHS 15 TO 20
CHANCE OF SNOW 80 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS ZERO IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND ZERO
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS 15 TO 20
LOWS ZERO TO 5 ABOVE ZERO

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 10 TO 15
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 5 ABOVE
